entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate audit potential/result in double remainder (REM) operation. #62992
  • Missing mscordbi.dll 6.0.21.52901 #62990
  • BitIncrement for Half handles negative values incorrectly #62988
  • how can I make .dll file generated same when rebuild solution if no source code change? #62987
  • [API Proposal]: Rename IsInstanceOfType #62984
  • JsonSerializer throws AccessViolationException for struct with field initializers #62983

Closed

  • [wasm] MarshalTests.MarshalFailedSynchronousTask fail on NodeJs #62901
    7.0.0
  • dotnet.wasm in node.js looks for module called 'a' and fails #41861
    7.0.0
  • Developers can run .NET libraries inside Node.js #47336
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle parameterless ctors in structs in STJ's ReflectionEmitMemberAccessor #62989
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fixed typo in remarks section of OnCompleted #62982
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • JIT: yet another OSR stress mode #62980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Add LoongArch64 support in libunwind. #62979
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix HAVE_PTHREAD_CONDATTR_SETCLOCK detection on Android #62978
    area-System.Threading

Merged

  • Have NativeAOT test execution project include SDK #62927
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Testing with NodeJs on CI #62779
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Suppress OSR for crossgen2 execution #62968
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Allow building libs against NativeAOT CoreLib #62945
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Handle RunClassConstructor with nonreflectable cctor #62947
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • .NET number values such as positive and negative infinity cannot be written as valid JSON. #62690
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1519999 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interace for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add the coreclr/pal and libunwind directory #62887
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-inc,gc, ToolBox directory. #62886
    community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add all the coreclr-build-config files #62889
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove errors during first run of runpaltests.h #62642
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix source-link test #62914
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
